column4: one of my drives is being recognized as being full. In windows it doesnt show up as full. I even deleted some stuff, emptied trash and it still shows up as full. How do I solve this?
Free Space on a drive is NOT the same as free space in a partition
Your FAT paritition may be able to save some more data (ie. it has some free space) but the fat32 partiton is actually taking up the whole of the drive (so there is no free space_)
